attrs.name: body-style
attrs.desc: Set the style of the card body. The optional value of this attribute is --
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is --

attrs.name: header-line
attrs.desc: Specifies whether to display a split line in the card header. The default value is true.

slots.name: header
slots.desc: Set the card header content, such as the title.

slots.name: footer
slots.desc: Set the content in the footer part of the card.

slots.name: default
slots.desc: Default slot, which is used to set the content of the card body.
